mapper.select: select chief_id, chief_title, chief_type, chief_content, chief_pic, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete from chief where chief_id = #{chiefId}
mapper.insert: insert into chief(chief_title, chief_type, chief_content, chief_pic, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values (#{chiefTitle}, #{chiefType}, #{chiefContent}, #{chiefPic}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{delete})

insert into chief(chief_title, chief_type, chief_content, chief_pic, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.chiefTitle}, #{entity.chiefType}, #{entity.chiefContent}, #{entity.chiefPic}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})

insert into chief(chief_title, chief_type, chief_content, chief_pic, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.chiefTitle}, #{entity.chiefType}, #{entity.chiefContent}, #{entity.chiefPic}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})
on duplicate key update chief_title = values(chief_title), chief_type = values(chief_type), chief_content = values(chief_content), chief_pic = values(chief_pic), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user), delete = values(delete)
mapper.update:
update chief
chief_title = #{chiefTitle},
chief_type = #{chiefType},
chief_content = #{chiefContent},
chief_pic = #{chiefPic},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
delete = #{delete},
where chief_id = #{chiefId}
